items.title: Stock Market Today: Iran-Israel war, Sebi F&O rules, KRN Heat IPO listing
items.description: GIFT Nifty signals a gap-down opening for benchmark indices Sensex and Nifty50 on Thursday, hinting a weak start for the markets.

items.title: Nifty Private Bank eyes negative breakout soon; check support level, target
items.description: The Nifty Private Banks Index is approaching a critical juncture, with the level of 26325 acting as a key pivot

items.title: Stocks To Watch: SBI, Mankind, Adani Enterprises, Dr. Reddy's, Zydus Life
items.description: Stocks to watch: SBI plans to open 600 new branches this fiscal year to expand its reach in emerging residential areas, said its chairman and managing director CS Setty.

items.title: Stocks to Buy: Vinay Rajani of HDFC Sec picks these two shares for Oct 3
items.description: Coforge is placed near its all-time high and has been outperforming the IT sector

items.title: Japanese investors' $4 trillion 'carry trade' begins to slowly unwind
items.description: In the first eight months of the year, Japanese investors snapped up a net ¥28 trillion ($192 billion) of the nation's government bonds, the largest amount for the time frame in at least 14 years

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty signals gap down open as Mid-East conflict ramps up
items.description: Share Market LIVE Updates: Markets in India looked set for a gap down start on Thursday, as indicated by GIFT Nifty futures, amid escalating tensions in the Middle East.

items.title: Dividend, Bonus, Split: KPI Green Energy, 5 others to go ex-date tomorrow
items.description: Ex-dividend stocks: Accelya Solutions India and KPI Green Energy will trade ex-dividend on Thursday, October 4, having announced final dividends of Rs 40 and Rs 0.20 per share, respectively

items.title: Navratri 2024: How are FII, DII, retail investors positioned in the market?
items.description: Derivatives market update for Oct 03: Dhupesh Dhameja of SAMCO Securities sees max pain for Nifty at 25,750 and Bank Nifty at 52,900 based on the existing options data.

items.title: KRN Heat Exchanger IPO listing: Shares make bumper debut at Rs 470 on BSE
items.description: KRN Heat Exchanger and Refrigeration make a robust debut at Rs 470 on BSE inline with Street's expectations

items.title: Iran-Israel war, Sebi F&O: Why Sensex plunged over 1,200 pts intraday today
items.description: The BSE Sensex fell as much as 1,264.2 points, or 1.50 per cent, reaching an intraday low of 83,002.09. Similarly, the Nifty 50 dropped 345.3 points, or 1.33%, hitting an intraday low of 25,451.60

items.title: JSW Steel hit all-time high, JSPL gains 3% after Nomura initiates 'Buy'
items.description: Nomura reckons JSW Steel's and JSPL's mid-cycle earnings have structurally improved due to stronger domestic demand, cost saving measures, and improved efficiency

items.title: Oil stocks surge as crude prices spike amid rising Middle-East tensions
items.description: Shares of Oil companies rallied over 3 per cent on Thursday as crude oil prices soared due to escalation of ongoing tensions in the Middle East region

items.title: Stock Market Crash LIVE Updates: Sensex down 900pts at 83,400, Nifty down 250pts at 25,500
items.description: Share Market Crash LIVE Updates: Indian benchmark indices BSE Sensex and Nifty 50 were trading deep in the red on Thursday, as escalating tensions in the Middle East weighed on market sentiment.

items.title: Dabur India forecasts weak Q2 revenue; stock slips 8%, hits 4-month low
items.description: Dabur India Q2 business update news: The management expects consolidated revenue to decline in mid-single digits due to heavy rain and floods across the parts of the country

items.title: Transformers & Rectifiers share up 5% on Rs 565-cr order from Power Grid
items.description: The Transformers and Rectifiers (India) Ltd share soared after the company announced that it has secured an order worth Rs 565 crore from Power Grid Corporation of India.

items.title: ITD Cementation surges 18% on Adani play; has zoomed 122% so far in 2024
items.description: ITD Cementation had announced on July 3, 2024, that its promoter Italian Thai Development (ITD) Public Company Limited is exploring a potential divestment of its investments in the company.

items.title: BSE to keep weekly options tied to Sensex despite new derivative rules
items.description: The new rules followed a spurt in retail investors trading options, which the regulator and the government viewed as a risk to household finances

items.title: Suzlon Energy shares drop over 4% after BSE, NSE serve warning letter
items.description: Suzlon Energy shares tanked up to 4.4 per cent at Rs 76.20 per share on the BSE in Thursday's intraday trade

items.title: Brokerages stock fall up to 8% after Sebi curbs F&O rules; details here
items.description: Among individual stocks, 5Paisa declined 7.65 per cent, followed by IIFL Securities (down 4.76 per cent), Geojit Financial Services (down 3.32 per cent) and MOFSL (down 3.15 per cent).

items.title: Navratri 2024: 9 stocks for your equity portfolio for sparkling returns
items.description: ONGC, Oil India, GNFC, Tata Chemicals and Sun Pharma are among the 9 stocks that could rally up to 20%, suggests technical charts. Check key support and resistance levels for these stocks here.

items.title: Alembic Pharma share price gains 5% after USFDA okays seizures drug
items.description: Alembic Pharma share price surged after the United States Food and Drug Administration (USFDA) gave final approval for Lamotrigine ExtendedRelease Tablets USP, 200 mg, 250 mg, and 300 mg.

items.title: Why shares of Asia's oldest stock exchange zoomed 55% in 1 month; Details
items.description: Shares of BSE (formerly Bombay Stock Exchange), Asia's oldest exchange, rallied 10% on the NSE to hit a new high of Rs 4,235 on Thursday's intra-day trade in an otherwise weak market.

items.title: Ashoka Buildcon stock soars over 4% after bagging LoAs worth Rs 1,727 cr
items.description: Ashoka Buildcon shares surged as much as 4.3 per cent at Rs 247 a piece on the BSE

items.title: Swiggy vs Zomato: Which is better investment bet? Morgan Stanley weighs in
items.description: Swiggy lags behind Zomato in some key segments, including food delivery and quick commerce, according to Morgan Stanley's analysis
